channel.title: Drug test
channel.description: I have a drug test today and I'm not sure if I'm going to pass. It's a first check marijuana test. I quit smoking weed the last week of november. On December 23, I shared one bowl pack with 2 of my friends. Not much at all, but I'm still paranoid. I'm only 125 pounds and have an extremely fast metabolism. Around 12 I started drinking water and I've drank well over a gallon. I need some help and I'm extremely paranoid right now, will I pass?!?!?!

item.title: Drug test
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

you’ll probably be alright with one of those shitty first check things after that long

i wouldn’t bother pounding water, it isn’t doing a lot of good

not like you’re going to jail or losing a job if you get caught, so no point in doing things that would actaully help you (someone elses piss)

Read full topic

item.title: Drug test
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:3, topic:375710”]Explisionist, I don’t think a single thing you said was true.

Andrew, Ibuprofen iprovides a false-positive for the THC in weed, if you think you’ll fail take an ibuprofen or two for some kind of “muscle pains” then tell them you took the ibuprofen. They’ll no doubt want a re-test but that gives you like a week to drink as much water and cranberry juice as you can to flush your system.

Remember, it’ll be out of your blood and urine relatively fast but it remains in fat and hair cells for anywhere up to 90 days. It really depends on the test, but there’s plenty of detox methods out there, some less reliable than others.

What’s the test for anyway?[/quote]

Mum found out I smoked around the end of november. Promised I would quit, and she suspects I still smoke. I talked her into letting me take it Saturday. I figure I will pass because of my metabolism and I didn’t smoke too much. I also plan on taking 4 asprin as I heard that helps dilute your urine. Other than that and drinking water, it’s a fucking gamble…

Read full topic

item.title: Drug test
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Explisionist, I don’t think a single thing you said was true.

Andrew, Ibuprofen iprovides a false-positive for the THC in weed, if you think you’ll fail take an ibuprofen or two for some kind of “muscle pains” then tell them you took the ibuprofen. They’ll no doubt want a re-test but that gives you like a week to drink as much water and cranberry juice as you can to flush your system.

Remember, it’ll be out of your blood and urine relatively fast but it remains in fat and hair cells for anywhere up to 90 days. It really depends on the test, but there’s plenty of detox methods out there, some less reliable than others.

What’s the test for anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: Drug test
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:1, topic:375711”]Andrew it takes a week to leave your system completely. Unless you use substitutes such as a small amount of bleach, I think also something about Jello works But you will need to google that stuff.

But it should be out of your system but there could be a small percent still in your body. Make sure you don’t get blood work done or your screwed.[/quote]

Stop fucking speaking bollocks.

Read full topic
